text: Ankaragücü Cycling Team was a Turkish professional cycling team, based in Ankara. The team was the men's and women's cycling department of MKE Ankaragücü, a major sports club in Ankara, Turkey. In 2010, Ankaragücü was the only team who had UCI licence by mountainbike discipline.Ankaragücü is the only one team who has UCI licenceAnkaragücü in international arenaAnkaragücü full supported by Salcano Semra Yetiş was part of the team in 2010. ==External links== * Ankaragücü Official Web Page ==References== Category:MKE Ankaragücü Category:Sport in Ankara Category:Defunct cycling teams based in Turkey Category:Cycling teams based in Turkey Category:Cycling teams established in 2008 Category:Cycling teams disestablished in 2012
title: Ankaragücü Cycling Team
